text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Parma, Idaho |native_name = |settlement_type = City |motto = |image_map = Canyon_County_Idaho_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Parma_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = |map_caption = Location in Canyon County and the state of Idaho |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = Idaho |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Canyon |established_date = |established_title2 = |established_title3 = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 2.85 |area_land_km2 = 2.80 |area_water_km2 = 0.05 |area_total_sq_mi = 1.10 |area_land_sq_mi = 1.08 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.02 |population_as_of = 2020 |population_est = |pop_est_as_of = |population_footnotes = |population_total = 2096 |population_density_km2 = |population_density_sq_mi = 1939 |timezone = Mountain (MST) |utc_offset = -7 |timezone_DST = MDT |utc_offset_DST = -6 |coordinates= |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = 2231 |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 83660 |area_code = 208 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 16-60940 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 0397010 |website = parmacity.net }} Parma is a city in Idaho in the United States of America.It is the fourth largest city in the county (behind Middleton, Caldwell, and Nampa all in the countyâ€™s eastern portion) and the largest in the rural western portion. ==Geography== Parma is located at (43.786009, -116.942656), at an elevation of above sea level. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Cities in Idaho
